nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导人职务，由中央委员会全体会议选举产生，负责召集中央政治局和中央政治局常务委员会会议，并主持中央书记处的工作。该职务始设于1925年，1945年至1982年间被中央委员会主席取代，后于1982年恢复设立至今。
description.en: The highest leadership position in the Communist Party of China, elected by the plenary session of the Central Committee. The General Secretary is responsible for convening meetings of the Politburo and its Standing Committee, and presides over the work of the Secretariat. The post was first established in 1925, replaced by the Chairman of the Central Committee from 1945 to 1982, and re-established in 1982.

description.zh-cn: 现任中共中央总书记、中华人民共和国最高领导人。
description.en: Current General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党创始人之一，首任中共中央总书记。
description.en: A co-founder of the Communist Party of China and its first General Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共中央主席和中共中央总书记，是1982年该职务恢复后的首任总书记。
description.en: Former Chairman and General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, and the first General Secretary after the post was reinstated in 1982.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人，曾长期担任中共中央主席。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China, who served as the Chairman of the CPC Central Committee for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 中国改革开放的总设计师，中共第二代中央领导集体的核心。在1980年代担任实际上的最高领导人。
description.en: The chief architect of China's reform and opening-up, and the core of the second generation of CPC central leadership. He was the de facto paramount leader in the 1980s.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理和中共中央总书记，因在六四事件中的立场被免职。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council of the PRC and General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, who was dismissed due to his stance during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 中共第三代中央领导集体的核心，曾任中共中央总书记。
description.en: The core of the third generation of CPC central leadership and former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中共第四代中央领导集体的核心，曾任中共中央总书记。
description.en: The core of the fourth generation of CPC central leadership and former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共中央总书记，后被国民党逮捕并处决。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, who was later arrested and executed by the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，曾代理中共中央总书记。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China, who served as acting General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，曾任中共中央总书记。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China, who served as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，曾任中共中央总书记。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China, who served as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的接班人，曾任中共中央主席、国务院总理和中央军委主席。
description.en: Mao Zedong's successor, who served as Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, Premier of the State Council, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关，选举产生总书记、中央政治局、中央政治局常务委员会等。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China, which elects the General Secretary, the Politburo, the Politburo Standing Committee, etc.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会主席

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主席
en: Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1945年至1982年间的最高领导人职务，后被总书记职务取代。
description.en: The highest leadership position in the Communist Party of China from 1945 to 1982, later replaced by the post of General Secretary.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第四次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第四次全国代表大会
en: 4th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 1925年召开的中国共产党全国代表大会，会上首次设立了中央委员会总书记职务。
description.en: The National Congress of the Communist Party of China held in 1925, which first established the post of General Secretary of the Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第七次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第七次全国代表大会
en: 7th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 1945年召开的中国共产党全国代表大会，会上决定以中央委员会主席取代总书记作为最高领导职务。
description.en: The National Congress of the Communist Party of China held in 1945, which decided to replace the General Secretary with the Chairman of the Central Committee as the highest leadership post.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十二次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十二次全国代表大会
en: 12th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 1982年召开的中国共产党全国代表大会，会上决定恢复设立总书记为最高领导职务，并废除中央委员会主席职务。
description.en: The National Congress of the Communist Party of China held in 1982, which decided to reinstate the General Secretary as the highest leadership post and abolish the post of Chairman of the Central Committee.

en: Constitution of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的根本法规，规定了党的纲领、组织机构、党员的权利和义务等。
description.en: The fundamental regulations of the Communist Party of China, stipulating the party's program, organizational structure, and the rights and obligations of its members.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
中共中央政治局常务委员会
中央政治局常务委员会
中共中央政治局常委会
en: Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高决策机构，由中央委员会全体会议选举产生。
description.en: The highest decision-making body of the Communist Party of China, elected by the plenary session of the Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China
Politburo of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的重要决策机构，由中央委员会全体会议选举产生。
description.en: An important decision-making body of the Communist Party of China, elected by the plenary session of the Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央书记处

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处
en: Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局及其常务委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative body of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and its Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1986年12月在中国各地发生的一系列学生示威活动，是导致时任中共中央总书记胡耀邦下台的直接原因之一。
description.en: A series of student demonstrations across China in December 1986, which was one of the direct causes for the resignation of then-General Secretary Hu Yaobang.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在北京天安门广场的抗议示威活动，最终以武力清场告终。该事件导致时任中共中央总书记赵紫阳被免职。
description.en: Protests and demonstrations that took place in Tiananmen Square, Beijing in 1989, which ended with a military crackdown. The event led to the dismissal of then-General Secretary Zhao Ziyang.

en: Eight Elders of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 指在1980年代到1990年代期间，在中华人民共和国拥有实际决策权的一批中国共产党元老，以邓小平为首。
description.en: Refers to a group of elderly CPC veterans who held substantial power and de facto decision-making authority in the People's Republic of China during the 1980s and 1990s, led by Deng Xiaoping.

description.zh-cn: 中国的历史性政党，曾在大陆执政，后迁至台湾。
description.en: A historic political party in China that formerly ruled on the mainland and later relocated to Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 1927年8月7日中共中央在汉口召开的紧急会议，会上纠正了陈独秀的右倾机会主义错误，并将其免职。
description.en: An emergency meeting of the CPC Central Committee held in Hankou on August 7, 1927, which corrected Chen Duxiu's right-wing opportunist errors and removed him from office.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党创始人及早期领导人之一。
description.en: A co-founder and early leader of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于1925年第四次全国代表大会上设立了总书记职务。
description.en: The Communist Party of China established the post of General Secretary at its 4th National Congress in 1925.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第四次全国代表大会
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 中共四大首次设立了中央委员会总书记职务。
description.en: The 4th National Congress of the CPC first established the post of General Secretary of the Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第七次全国代表大会
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 中共七大决定以中央委员会主席取代总书记作为党的最高领导职务。
description.en: The 7th National Congress of the CPC decided to replace the General Secretary with the Chairman of the Central Committee as the party's highest leadership post.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十二次全国代表大会
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 中共十二大决定恢复设立总书记为党的最高领导职务。
description.en: The 12th National Congress of the CPC decided to reinstate the General Secretary as the party's highest leadership post.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十二次全国代表大会
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会主席

description.zh-cn: 中共十二大决定不再设立中央委员会主席和副主席的职务。
description.en: The 12th National Congress of the CPC decided to no longer set up the posts of Chairman and Vice-Chairman of the Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 陈独秀在1925年中共四大上当选为首任总书记。
description.en: Chen Duxiu was elected as the first General Secretary at the 4th National Congress of the CPC in 1925.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
中国共产党中央委员会总书记
中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 自1931年9月起，博古作为中共临时中央政治局总负责人，实际履行总书记职责。
description.en: Since September 1931, Bo Gu, as the general responsible person of the Provisional Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, effectively performed the duties of General Secretary.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦是1982年恢复总书记职务后的首任总书记。
description.en: Hu Yaobang was the first General Secretary after the post was reinstated in 1982.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
中国共产党中央委员会总书记
中国共产党中央委员会总书记
中国共产党中央委员会总书记
陈独秀

description.zh-cn: 在八七会议上，陈独秀被免去总书记职务。
description.en: At the August 7th Conference, Chen Duxiu was removed from the post of General Secretary.

relationships.target: 胡耀邦

description.zh-cn: 因八六学潮，胡耀邦被迫辞去中共中央总书记职务。
description.en: Due to the 1986 student protests, Hu Yaobang was forced to resign from his position as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 赵紫阳

description.zh-cn: 因在六四事件中的立场，赵紫阳被罢免所有职务。
description.en: Due to his stance during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, Zhao Ziyang was dismissed from all his posts.

relationships.target: 向忠发

description.zh-cn: 1931年6月，向忠发被中国国民党逮捕后遭处决。
description.en: In June 1931, Xiang Zhongfa was arrested and subsequently executed by the Kuomintang.

relationships.target: 邓小平

description.zh-cn: 在胡耀邦担任总书记期间，以邓小平为首的中共元老拥有实际的最高决策权。
description.en: During Hu Yaobang's tenure as General Secretary, CPC elders led by Deng Xiaoping held the actual ultimate decision-making power.

relationships.target: 邓小平

description.zh-cn: 在赵紫阳担任总书记期间，中共中央政治局常委会在重大问题上需请示邓小平，实际最高决策权在于邓小平。
description.en: During Zhao Ziyang's tenure as General Secretary, the Politburo Standing Committee had to consult Deng Xiaoping on major issues, meaning the actual ultimate decision-making power rested with Deng.

relationships.target: 江泽民

description.zh-cn: 邓小平确立了江泽民作为中共第三代领导集体的核心。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping established Jiang Zemin as the core of the third generation of CPC leadership.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记由中央委员会全体会议选举产生。
description.en: The General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee is elected by the plenary session of the Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央书记处
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 中共中央总书记负责主持中央书记处的工作。
description.en: The General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee presides over the work of the Central Secretariat.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央政治局
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 中共中央总书记负责召集中央政治局会议，且中央政治局委员需向总书记述职。
description.en: The General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee is responsible for convening Politburo meetings, and Politburo members must report their work to the General Secretary.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 中共中央总书记负责召集中央政治局常务委员会会议，且常务委员需向总书记述职。
description.en: The General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee is responsible for convening Politburo Standing Committee meetings, and Standing Committee members must report their work to the General Secretary.

relationships.target: 张国焘

description.zh-cn: 1927年7月12日陈独秀被停职后，实际主持中共中央工作的是临时中央政治局常委张国焘。
description.en: After Chen Duxiu was suspended on July 12, 1927, Zhang Guotao, a member of the Provisional Politburo Standing Committee, effectively presided over the work of the CPC Central Committee.
